title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify a state with a state income tax rate between 2 percent and 5 percent.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a pattern on the map.

For Task C, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about how the ideologies of the political parties shaped the pattern described in part (B).

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how the variation in income tax rates shown on the map illustrates the role of fiscal policies in economic policymaking.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
